get.description: Use this call to get a list of valid evaluators and the groups which they belong to. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get a list of valid evaluation fields for a given rule type. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get a list of valid options for a given field (and, if relevant, key). Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to get a list of valid options for a given set of fields (and, if relevant, keys). Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to get a list of valid keys for a given field. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to get a list of valid keys for a set of fields. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to retrieve a list of rules Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to retrieve a list of rules of a given type Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get information about the nodes belonging to a rule, excluding the condition items. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to retrieve details about a given condition. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to retrieve a list of valid action types for the rule type Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to create a new condition. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to update a conditon and its condition items. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to check to see if a condition name already exists at a specific level. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: fkConditionId
parameters.description: Must be specified if checking that a condition name exists under a sub-condition. If checking rule-level conditions, do not specify.

parameters.name: excludeConditionId
parameters.description: If the check is for renaming a condition, specify the condition id here to exclude it from the results.

get.description: Use this call to get a list of valid options for a given action Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to update an action Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to add a new action to a condition node. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to delete an action from a rule. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to delete a conditio and its subconditions/actions Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to swap the sort order of two conditions belonging to the same parent Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Use this call to get a list of fields and keys used by a given rule. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to get a list of fields and keys used by a given rule type Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Use this call to test a rule against a set of test values Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to set a draft rule live (if the draft is a copy for editing an existing rule, the existing rule will be deleted and the draft promoted). Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to create a draft copy in order to edit an existing rule. Once set live, this draft will replace the rule it was copied from. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to create a new draft based on an existing rule. Once set live, this draft will be a unique rule in its own right. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to create a new draft rule of a specified type. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to set the enabled state of a rule Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to rename a rule. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to permanently delete a rule from the system. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to change the executing order of the rules by swapping them with each other. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to enable or disable a condition. Any subconditions or actions belonging to the condition will not be evaluated or executed if it is disabled. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Use this call to copy a condition, its subconditions and actions. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Use this call to copy an action from one condition to another condition. Actions may not be attached to the rule header or condition nodes with subconditions. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.RulesEngineNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

fieldKeys.description: A list of fields and optionally keys.

fieldNames.description: The field names to get the keys for

header.description: An object describing the condition to be added.

conditionHeader.description: The condition object describing the revised condition. pkConditionId and fkRuleId must be unchanged.

action.description: The details of the updated action. pkActionId and fkConditionId must be unchanged original.
An object describing the action to add.

pkActionId.description: The id of the action to delete

pkConditionId1.description: The id of the first condition

pkConditionId2.description: The id of the second condition

pkRuleId.description: The id of the draft rule.
The rule id to create a draft of.

ruleName.description: The name of the new draft.
The name for the new draft.

enabled.description: Boolean incidating whether or not the rule is enabled

ruleName.description: The new name for the rule

enabled.description: True for enabled, False for disabled.

pkRuleId.description: The rule to which the conditions belong.

targetParentConditionId.description: The condition to which the copy should be appended as a child.

pkRuleId.description: The rule which the action belongs to.

targetParentConditionId.description: The condition to add the action to.

pkActionId.description: The id of the action to copy.
